full_summary:
### Mobile Sandblasters Tender Request for Proposal

#### Tender Information

* **Reference Number**: WS3866710917
* **Solicitation Number**: WS3866710917.Doc3866797293
* **Tender Status**: Expired
* **Publication Date**: 2023-02-10
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-03-10T14:00:00 (Eastern Standard Time)

#### Amended Tender Information

* **Tender Status**: The closing time for submitting bids has been amended to 2023-03-10 at 1400 EST.

#### Brief Description of the Tender

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) invites qualified suppliers to submit a tender for the supply and delivery of the following equipment:

* 1 x Sandblaster
* 1 x Compressor
* 1 x Sandblasting helmet with breathing air filter system

The tendered equipment will be delivered to the Department of National Defence, Garrison Petawawa, and the equipment is expected to be delivered by 20 June 2023.

#### Tender Evaluation Criteria

The proposals will be evaluated based on a combination of technical merit and price, and the successful bidder will be selected based on the highest overall score.

#### Procurement Information

* **Solicitation Method**: Competitive – Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category**: Goods (NotebooksGSID None)
* **Trade Agreements**: This tender complies with the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity**: None
* **Regions of Delivery**: Petawawa

#### Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **End User Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **Contact Person:** Darlene Keenan (DND/SPAC)
* **Email:** [darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:darlene.keenan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)

#### Accessing Tender Documents

For more information, please click on the following link: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15384501?extsite=MTUzODQ1MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15384501?extsite=MTUzODQ1MDFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5
